project1.projectDescription: A Windows application to convert Unreal Engine projects into reusable templates with configurable options and media support.
coreFeatures: Convert Unreal Engine projects to templates
Media handling for icons and preview images

description: The idea was to streamline the creation of reusable templates for Unreal Engine projects. It aims to simplify the workflow for developers and provide a standardized template format.
The design focuses on a minimalistic and user-friendly UI. Features include drag-and-drop folder selection and visual progress updates.

coreElements.description: Allows users to select source and target folders for template generation.
Provides inputs for template name, description, and asset details.

result.description: Successfully developed and released the UE Template Converter tool, enhancing project reusability and developer productivity.

project2.projectDescription: A lightweight tool designed to consolidate multiple files from a project folder into a single organized text file, simplifying tasks like sharing with AI tools for programming support.
coreFeatures: Consolidates multiple files from a folder into one text file
Supports common file types like .txt, .cpp, and .html
Allows skipping media files such as images and videos
Real-time progress updates with a progress bar
Customizable output file name and location
otherFeatures: File delimiters for clear content organization
Option to exclude unsupported file types automatically

description: AllinOneTxt was created to address a personal need: simplifying the process of uploading multiple project files to ChatGPT for assistance.
The idea came from the repetitive task of merging files manually, which was time-consuming and prone to errors.
The design focused on simplicity, with a minimalistic UI that ensures all functionalities are accessible without overwhelming the user.
The program's core revolves around the responsiveness and clarity of its real-time feedback during operations.

coreElements.description: Allows users to select the folder containing the files to consolidate.
Enables users to customize the name of the consolidated text file.
Lets users choose where the output file will be saved.
Shows the current file being processed and overall progress.

result.description: AllinOneTxt successfully simplifies the process of consolidating project files for programming and collaboration purposes, making it ideal for tasks like uploading files to AI tools or sharing with team members.

project3.projectDescription: A personal website showcasing my journey, skills, and portfolio as an Unreal Engine programmer, with a focus on modular and reusable web development techniques.
coreFeatures: Responsive design ensuring optimal display on any device.
Dynamic content rendering powered by JavaScript modules.
Flexible JSON-based structure for project and gallery management.
Reusable components for sections like modals, galleries, and cards.
otherFeatures: Social media integration with dynamic icon styling.
Support for galleries with smooth transitions and captions.
Efficient page navigation using history states and modal management.

description: The goal was to build a personal brand through a professional online presence. The site highlights my Unreal Engine projects while demonstrating advanced web development techniques, focusing on reusability and modularity.

The website design prioritizes clarity and ease of navigation. Each page integrates reusable CSS and JavaScript components to ensure consistency across sections while allowing customization where needed.

coreElements.description: Cards dynamically render project data from a JSON file, making content updates simple and scalable.
A modular system for displaying image galleries with captions and smooth transitions.
A reusable modal system supporting deep linking and browser history management for seamless navigation.
Dynamically loads footer content across all pages, ensuring consistent branding and easy updates.

result.description: The website successfully serves as a hub for my personal and professional journey, showcasing my skills, projects, and achievements while providing visitors with an engaging and user-friendly experience.
